songs.title: Devil's Bride
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Dressed in black
Satan's bride
No turning back
She'll bear his child

[Hook]
Devil's bride
Devil's bride

[Verse 2]
The Devil's nod
Initiate her
Thirteen candles
Upon the altar

[Hook]
Alright

[Verse 3]
The chanting grows
The time is near
Lucifer's consort
She shows no fear

[Hook]
